name: Stickman Fighting
description: Take part in the epic bully battle in parallel worlds. Fight with your rivals, complete the numerous levels and become as firm as a stone!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTS 450 or AMD Radeon HD 6750 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
